text.section: A person may not impersonate another in an examination held under this subtitle.
A person may not willfully or corruptly falsify a score or report on an examination held under this subtitle.

section.section: Notwithstanding paragraph (1)(iv) of this subsection, a person may answer any inquiry from the Secretary.

text.section: A candidate for employment may not deceive the Commission or the Secretary in order to improve the candidate's chances for appointment.

section.section: A candidate for appointment to a merit system position may not sign a resignation from that position in advance of the appointment.
A resignation signed in violation of paragraph (1) of this subsection is void and of no effect.
